section.title: Description
section.para: The component implements a modal dialog window. All operations in the main application window are locked out while this window is active. Opening and closing the window is done through client JavaScript code.

itemizedlist.listitem: Support of draggable operations and size changes by a user
Easy positioning for the modal dialog window
Possibility to restore of the previous component state on a page (including position on the screen) after submitting and reloading
